project_plan.name: Weather Fetching Python Program
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API. The program will display the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement the function to fetch weather data from the API
Parse the data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement the command-line interface for user input for city selection
Format and display the fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for each implemented feature
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
